text: in musharikon ko kisee sandhi kee koee zimmedaaree allaah aur usake rasool par kaise baaqee rah sakatee hai? - un logon ka maamala isase alag hai, jinase tumane masjide haraam (kaaba) ke paas sandhi kee thee, to jab tak ve tumhaare saath seedhe rahen, tab tak tum bhee unake saath seedhe raho. nishchay hee allaah ko dar rakhanevaale priy hai.
